scopingsheet_markdown:
# Scoping Sheet for HealthTrack Application

   | Category                        | Requirement                             | Status                                                                                                                          |
   | --------------------------------| --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
   | Application Overview            | Application Name                        | HealthTrack                                                                                                                      |
   | Application Overview            | Production URL                         | https://healthtrack.com                                                                                                          |
   | Application Overview            | Environment for Testing                | Development                                                                                                                       |
   | Application Overview            | Application Type                        | Web, API, Mobile                                                                                                                 |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Authentication Method                  | Username & Password, OAuth                                                                                                       |
   | Authentication & Access Control | User Roles                             | Anonymous Users, Regular Users, Power Users, Administrators                                                                      |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Custom Roles                           | 1                                                                                                                               |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Session Management                     | JWT                                                                                                                              |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Session Timeout Period                 | 30 minutes                                                                                                                      |
   | Input Processing                | Total Number of Input Fields            | 10                                                                                                                               |
   | Input Processing                | Input Types Present                     | Free text fields, Personal data, Database queries                                                                                |
   | Data Processing                 | Sensitive Data Handled                  | Personal Information, Healthcare Information                                                                                    |
   | Data Processing                 | Data Storage                           | Local Database, Third-party Services                                                                                             |
   | API Details                     | Number of Endpoints                      | 15                                                                                                                               |
   | API Details                     | Authentication Required                | Yes                                                                                                                              |
   | API Details                     | Rate Limiting                           | Yes                                                                                                                              |
   | API Details                     | Documentation Available                | Yes                                                                                                                              |
   | API Details                     | API Methods                             | GET, POST, PUT                                                                                                                   |
   | Infrastructure                  | Security Controls Present               | WAF, IPS/IDS, Load Balancer, API Gateway                                                                                         |
   | Infrastructure                  | Hosting                                | On-premises                                                                                                                     |
   | Business Logic                  | Critical Functions                      | User Data Management                                                                                                            |
   | Security Requirements           | Compliance Requirements                 | HIPAA, GDPR                                                                                                                       |
   | Security Requirements           | Previous Testing                        | 20/11/2023                                                                                                                     |
   | Security Requirements           | Known Vulnerabilities                   | Data Leakage in logs                                                                                                            |
   | Security Requirements           | Critical Assets                        | Patient Records                                                                                                                 |
   | Testing Constraints             | Time Restrictions                       | During Business Hours only                                                                                                      |
   | Testing Constraints             | Testing Limitations                     | No Destructive Testing, No Automated Scanning                                                                                  |
   | Deliverables                    | Required Reports                        | Executive Summary, Technical Details, Remediation Plan, Compliance Mapping, Risk Rating                                       |
   | Notes                           | Additional Information                 | Application follows strict access control policies for healthcare data. Encryption is enforced for all stored patient records.  |
   | Client Contact Information      | Client Email                           | diansofia03@gmail.com                                                                                                            |
   | Client Contact Information      | Client Company                         | Health Track                                                                                                                    |
   | Client Contact Information      | Client Name                            | Sofia                                                                                                                           |

requirement_df.status: Application follows strict access control policies for healthcare data. Encryption is enforced for all stored patient records
